job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-05T17:46:27.000Z", "description": "

This position is a great opportunity for an entrepreneurially-minded person who enjoys making a difference in a start-up environment. Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to both create and extend existing models. 


Responsibilities

  • Build, extend, deploy, maintain, and troubleshoot machine learning solutions to help drive business metrics.
  • Collaborate with analytics and data teams to optimize machine learning model performance and data pipelines.
  • Ensure our relevancy in the field of machine learning by staying up to date on the latest ML techniques and become the subject matter expert within the company.
  • Develop solutions to complex problems without considerable technical direction.

 


Qualifications and Experience

  • 2-4 years of experience as a machine learning engineer or data scientist
  • Experience with developing software in object-oriented programming languages, including Python, Scala, Java, or C++
  • Experience with machine learning tools, including Tensorflow, Pytorch, or Scikit Learn
  • Proven and demonstrated experience with data preparation, building, scaling, and optimizing machine learning solutions
  • Self-driven, organized, reliable and determined team player
  • Thinks analytically and solves complex problems within a team structure
  • Flexible and able to adapt to new processes and requirements in a dynamic environment
  • Strong, clear and concise written and verbal communication skills
  • Advocates for innovation and drives change through persuasion and consensus
  • Translates issues/problems into solutions with tangible changes that improve the team or the organization


***Unfortunately, this position does not offer work sponsorship at this time***



Keywords: machine learning, ML, engineering, data science, programming, models, modeling, python, tools, data, building, deploying, scaling, troubleshooting, maintaining, strategy
